text: I hate the STAAR test I had to take the STAAR test today  For those of you who don t know what this is  the STAAR test is a standardized test we have to take every year and we have to pass it to move up to the next grade level  We take one for every main subject  which is math  science  English and social studies  The one I took today was   questions and we also had to write an essay  But the worst part was waiting for everyone else in the school to finish so we could go home  we get   hours to take it  We can t use our phones  we can t talk  so all we can do is sleep or read a book  I hate this test  I hate it with a passion
